attributes.action: enforse the law to ensure host families have a CRB, when accommodating children in own home
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Ed Balls dept says thet all people who take in child students must have CRB. When I contacted English Uk and other orgonisations who oversee language schools, they said it was down to the school. I have taken in young students and have never needed a Police check. Single men can take in a child and I cant imagine anything worse than not speaking English and being threatened.
The peodiophile network must have spotted this loophole by now. Foreign children need the same protection as British children.
